mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.name AS name, -- 즐겨찾기 테이블에 있으면 1(true), 없으면 0(false) CASE WHEN pf.favorite_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isFavorite FROM Project p JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id LEFT JOIN ProjectFavorite pf ON p.project_id = pf.project_id AND pf.user_id = #{userId} WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY p.name ASC
SELECT name, status, daily_report_time AS dailyReportTime FROM Project WHERE project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT t.task_id AS taskId, t.title AS title, t.priority AS priority FROM Task t JOIN TaskUser tu ON t.task_id = tu.task_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND tu.user_id = #{userId} AND t.status != 'DONE' AND t.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY t.priority DESC, t.due_date ASC LIMIT 5
